titleStmt.title: The Anabaptists printed proposals bearing date the 12th of October, 1674. Subscribed by William Kiffin, Jeremy Ives, Thomas Plant, Thomas Hicks and Daniel Dike. Briefly discussed: and Jeremy Ives's late daring challenge to the Quakers, answered. By a lover of truth, T. Rudyard.
titleStmt.author: Rudyard, Thomas, d. 1692.

titleStmt.title: The Anabaptists printed proposals bearing date the 12th of October, 1674. Subscribed by William Kiffin, Jeremy Ives, Thomas Plant, Thomas Hicks and Daniel Dike. Briefly discussed: and Jeremy Ives's late daring challenge to the Quakers, answered. By a lover of truth, T. Rudyard.
titleStmt.author: Rudyard, Thomas, d. 1692.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
Caption title on p. 3 reads: The Anabaptists printed proposals briefly discussed: bearing date the twelfth of October, 1674.
"An answer to Jeremy Ives's challenge" has caption title on p. 17.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
